title: Azure AI Evaluation Metrics
description: Metrics for Azure AI Evaluation service

prerequisites.messageMarkdown: Evaluation metrics are built on top of [evaluators](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/concepts/observability#what-are-evaluators). You must enable [Azure AI evaluation continuous evaluation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/how-to/monitor-applications). "TargetingId" must be added to the evaluation spans.
